padaya aashritha roga, madhushani, eeye rathriya maha asamanya rathriyak wuna , hawas waruwe , sonduru hadawathak athi minisek , digital satahanakin mage lipiyata pilithuru dunna , ow , eeka samanya deyak , me blog awakashe inna bohomayak mama handunanne me akuru amunumu harahama pamanayi , eeth ee haraha , bandena hrudayangama mithudam nam pudumakara bandimak ...ithin me dun pilithurata thuthi satahanak thiyala , punchi wada katayuthu kihipayakata asalwasi niwasata giyath , eya paya dekaka withara katha bahakata diguwuna , ee suhada kathabawa , hamuwim walin passe aayeth geta godawadunu mama puruddata wagema , pariganakaya pana ganwuwa , obath math athare wu awasan debasa meya yayi kese sithannada ?
